member.name: D3D11_CLASS_INSTANCE_DESC.InstanceId
member.summary: The instance ID of an HLSL class; the default value is 0.

member.name: D3D11_CLASS_INSTANCE_DESC.InstanceIndex
member.summary: The instance index of an HLSL class; the default value is 0.

member.name: D3D11_CLASS_INSTANCE_DESC.TypeId
member.summary: The type ID of an HLSL class; the default value is 0.

member.name: D3D11_CLASS_INSTANCE_DESC.ConstantBuffer
member.summary: Describes the constant buffer associated with an HLSL class; the default value is 0.

member.name: D3D11_CLASS_INSTANCE_DESC.BaseConstantBufferOffset
member.summary: The base constant buffer offset associated with an HLSL class; the default value is 0.

member.name: D3D11_CLASS_INSTANCE_DESC.BaseTexture
member.summary: The base texture associated with an HLSL class; the default value is 127.

member.name: D3D11_CLASS_INSTANCE_DESC.BaseSampler
member.summary: The base sampler associated with an HLSL class; the default value is 15.

member.name: D3D11_CLASS_INSTANCE_DESC.Created
member.summary: True if the class was created; the default value is false.
